verbose_text: In the MW microcosm, the wbe and ctxA genes were amplified up to day 49, whereas DNA templates prepared from V. cholerae O1 cells inoculated and maintained in the MW-CC microcosm supported amplification of wbe and ctxA genes by M-PCR up to 174 days, confirming presence of toxigenic V. cholerae O1.
evidence: supported amplification of wbe and ctxA genes by M-PCR up to 174 days, confirming presence of toxigenic V. cholerae O1
